solution_line_template: The total amount of money raised from friends contribution is {friends_percentage}*${total_campaign_funds} = $<<{friends_percentage}*{total_campaign_funds}={friends_contribution}>>{friends_contribution}
Minus his friend's contribution, the 40th president has raised ${total_campaign_funds}-${friends_contribution} = ${remaining_after_friends}
If the family raised ${family_contribution}, the savings the 40th president had for the campaign is ${remaining_after_friends}-${family_contribution} = ${own_savings}
